caption: Table 1: A review of discussion of CCS in the literature by analyzing the 20 most-cited papers mentioning CCS. We find that the issues we discuss in this paper are not currently represented in the literature.
description: This table presents a review of 20 papers that cite the Contrast-Consistent Search (CCS) method. The table summarizes the usage of CCS, indicating whether the cited papers correctly understand the method and whether they raise any concerns similar to those presented in the paper.
